comments.body:
this requires the 2.3 version (as mentioned in failing CI tests):
https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/release-notes/typescript-2-3.html
Can we add the 2.3 requiment pragma(s) as here?
https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/pull/29101
Thank you @peterblazejewicz for the quick review and the useful link!
